activities: Colt International provides aviation fuel and flight support services to customers throughout the world.  When accessing the site, data submitted from customers in the European Union and/or Switzerland is sent to servers located in Texas.  These servers then send data back to the customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Aviation Services - (AVS)Computer Software - (CSF)Insurance Services - (INS)Travel & Tourism Services - (TRA)
personaldata: Online data submitted by customers and prospective customers as well as users of the site.
privacyprograms: Colt International, LLC is not a member of any privacy programs relevant to the Safe Harbor.
recoursemech: Colt has developed an in-house mechanism that utilizes the JAMS dispute resolution service.  This third party dispute resolution mechanism deals with concerns and disputes arising from Privacy Polices and the Safe Harbor framework.
